problems.title: Find Parent Value at Given Index in Max Heap
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given N integers, create a max heap and find the parent value at a given index.

Rules:
- Parent index = (child_index - 1) / 2
- If index is 0 (root), return -1
- If index is invalid, return -1

Input Format
First line: N (number of integers)
Second line: N space-separated integers
Third line: index

Output Format
Print the parent value or -1.

Example
Input:
5
30 20 40 10 25
2

Output:
40
problems.examples:
Sample Input 1
5
30 20 40 10 25
2

Sample Output 1
40

Sample Input 2
3
10 20 30
0

Sample Output 2
-1
